text: The movie accomplished what it set out to do; it was entertaining throughout
One of the best Action and Comedy movies I’ve ever seen, Great Casting too and story line, I’m hoping for part 2
So many people taking this movie seriously.  It's completely absurdist & had to be a blast making it.  Obviously borrowed things from other movies but used them satirically.  Love it.
The premise is simple, but the characters carry this movie. Brian Tyree Henry's "Lemon" is especially memorable.
Every second with Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry is genuinely hilarious.
This movie is absolute rubbish! Violence after violence! No wonder people are so violent dorks! That’s because of this one movie (and other similar production) DOWN WITH VIOLENCE!!
Leitch helms his action with clarity and impact, creating a beautiful thrill ride that could have been a trainwreck, but entertains to the end of the line
Hell yeah. My boy Brad Pitt.
Hell Yeah.
Very entertaining movie plenty of action and comedy. I found Brad Pitt hysterical. The ending does drag a little bit but overall I really liked this movie 9.5/10.
Leitch helms his action with clarity and impact, creating a beautifully nonsensical thrill ride that could have been a trainwreck, but entertains to the end of the line.

Bullet Train is turbulent and chaotic but a thrilling ride nonetheless. Its illogical, blood-soaked premise may derail some, but others might find charm in its memorable cameos, wild hairstyles, and magnetic characters.
Incredible movie, well paced, fun plot. Every time you watch it you notice something new that makes the movie all that much better

Bullet Train is turbulent and chaotic but a thrilling ride nonetheless. Its illogical, blood-soaked premise may derail some, but others might find charm in its memorable cameos, wild hairstyles, and magnetic characters.

Bullet Train employs David Leitch's maximalist style in a purposefully silly narrative driven by frenetic action and distinct humor. Every second with Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry is genuinely hilarious.
This is probably the best movie I have ever seen, it has amazing plot twists and fight scenes, theres no boring characters and they always find a way to make the bad parts good again.
Honestly really liked it but is lwk crazy
Highly entertaining.
boring. not a big fan but good action
